FeedItemCard.signInToVoteToast: You must be signed in to vote

CreatePostModal.title: Create a new post
CreatePostModal.description: Share an update, ask a question, or start a conversation with the community
CreatePostModal.pollOptionsError: A poll must have at least 2 non-empty options

tooltip.onlineSynced: You are online and all changes are synced.
tooltip.offline: You are offline. {count, plural, =0 {No pending changes.} =1 {1 change is queued.} other {{count} changes are queued.}}

offline.title: You are offline.
offline.description: Your changes will be saved and synced when you reconnect.

synced.title: Sync complete
synced.description: All your offline changes have been saved.

syncFailed.title: Sync failed
syncFailed.description: We could not sync your offline changes. We will try again later.

queued.title: Action queued
queued.description: This action will be performed when you are back online.

hero.title: Empowering Agriculture from Soil to Sale on {appName}
hero.subtitle: The single platform connecting every stakeholder in the agricultural value chain for a more transparent, efficient, and sustainable future.

features.title: DamDoh's Main Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to grow, connect, and trade, all in one place.

networking.title: Intelligent Networking
networking.description: AI-powered connection suggestions to link you with the right partners, from suppliers to international buyers.

marketplace.title: Direct Marketplace
marketplace.description: Buy and sell products and services directly, increasing transparency and profitability for all stakeholders.

forums.title: Topical Forums
forums.description: Share knowledge, discuss challenges, and collaborate on solutions in topic-specific forums.

talent.title: Talent Exchange
talent.description: Offer or find specialized agricultural services, from on-demand harvesting to drone surveys.

forWho.title: One Platform for the Entire Value Chain
forWho.description: DamDoh is uniquely designed to serve the entire agricultural ecosystem, creating a single point of truth and opportunity for all.

farmers.title: Farmers
farmers.description: Access better markets, find quality inputs, and get expert advice to increase yield and profitability.

buyers.title: Buyers & Processors
buyers.description: Source high-quality, traceable produce directly from growers and co-ops, ensuring supply chain reliability.

experts.title: Experts & Service Providers
experts.description: Offer your specialized skills and services to a wide agricultural audience seeking your expertise.

forWho.imageAlt: A diverse group of agricultural stakeholders collaborating

cta.title: Join the Agricultural Revolution
cta.subtitle: Sign up today and become part of a growing global network dedicated to transforming the future of food.

AppFooter.tagline: The global platform for the agricultural supply chain.

networkPage.title: Stakeholder Network
networkPage.description: Discover and connect with farmers, buyers, service providers, and experts across the agricultural value chain.
networkPage.aiSuggestionsDescription: Based on your profile, here are some people you might want to connect with.
networkPage.browseAllDescription: Use the filters below to find specific people or businesses in the network.
networkPage.noStakeholdersHint: Try adjusting your search filters or check back later.

toast.noSuggestions: No new suggestions available at this time.

networkPage.noSuggestions: No suggestions available at this time. Complete your profile for better recommendations.

myNetworkPage.connectionsDescription: These are your approved connections on the platform. You can now message them directly.
myNetworkPage.noConnections: You haven't made any connections yet. Start exploring the network!
myNetworkPage.requestsDescription: Review and respond to pending connection requests.
myNetworkPage.noRequests: You have no pending connection requests.

agentToolsPage.accessDeniedDescription: You do not have the required permissions to access these tools.
agentToolsPage.title: Field Agent Tools
agentToolsPage.description: Tools for authorized agents to assist and manage users in the field.
agentToolsPage.resultsPlaceholder: User details will appear here after a successful search.

messagingPage.title: Messages
messagingPage.noConversations: You have no conversations yet. Start a new chat from a user's profile.
messagingPage.selectConversation: Select a conversation to start messaging.
messagingPage.noMessages: No messages in this conversation yet. Send one to get started!
messagingPage.couldNotStartConversation: Could not start a new conversation.
messagingPage.couldNotSendMessage: Could not send your message. Please try again.
messagingPage.signInToView: Sign in to view your messages.

searchPage.title: Universal Search
searchPage.description: Find anything on the DamDoh platform, from products and services to people and discussions.
searchPage.placeholder: Search for organic coffee, tractor repair, or a user...

modal.title: Universal Search
modal.searchErrorDescription: An unexpected error occurred during the search. Please try again.
modal.invalidCodeError: This does not appear to be a valid DamDoh QR Code.
modal.scanErrorDescription: Could not read the QR code. Please try again.
modal.noResults: No results found for your query.
modal.tryAgain: Try another search term or use broader keywords.
